title: Microsoft LifeCam Show Webcam (Black)
description: The Microsoft LifeCam Show comes with a complete attachment system–desktop  stand, laptop clip, and attachment discs–to make setting up and using your  LifeCam a snap, no matter what type of PC you own. To show yourself, face the  webcam forward. To show friends and family, simply flip it around!Works with: Windows Live™ Messenger, Yahoo! Messenger, AOL Instant  Messenger, SkypeProduct Features:   Desktop Stand Laptop Clip Attachment Disc          Windows Live™ Call Button Photo Swap Carrying Case Additional Features:
